title: Cauce Adapter Capability
description: Definition of an operation that an adapter exposes for on-demand invocation

name.description: Unique capability name within this adapter (snake_case)

description.description: Human-readable description of what this capability does

input_schema.description: JSON Schema defining the input parameters for this capability

output_schema.description: JSON Schema defining the response format for this capability

idempotent.description: If true, this capability is safe to retry on failure without side effects

readonly.description: If true, this capability does not modify any state

timeout_hint_ms.description: Expected execution time in milliseconds (hint for callers)
